forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of 2 to 4 inches possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow between 10pm and 4am, then rain and snow likely. Cloudy. Low around 30, with temperatures rising to around 33 overnight. South southwest wind 7 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of 2 to 4 inches possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and snow likely before 7am, then rain and snow between 7am and 9am, then rain and snow between 9am and 3pm. Cloudy. High near 37, with temperatures falling to around 31 in the afternoon. West wind 8 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 17. Northwest wind 8 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 29. West wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible
forecast.shortForecast: Areas Of Freezing Drizzle then Chance Light Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of freezing drizzle and a slight chance of snow showers before 7pm, then a chance of snow. Mostly cloudy. Low around 19, with temperatures rising to around 23 overnight. Southeast wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

High near 26, with temperatures falling to around 21 in the afternoon. North wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: From the park website: Bucks Run is currently closed.  Snow is currently being made for Bucks Run and construction will being in the coming weeks. The golf course trails, Coyote Run and Hawk Hills, along with Cedar Trace were rolled December 9, 2025.  No additional grooming has taken place.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Please access the XC trails from Valley road during snowmaking. The upper trails are groomed and in great shape.
nubsNob.comments: Nub's Nob is closed today so that we can concentrate on snowmaking. We will be open daily beginning December 12. The Snow Crew is making rapid progress and we plan to have all of the frontside and southside runs open by December 13. Pintail Peak should open by December 20. Thanks for skiing at Nub's Nob.
